pullRequest.title: [CAMEL-13812] Split FAQ into separate module under user-manual
pullRequest.bodyText:
Created a separate module for FAQ under docs/user-manual/modules.
Added nav.doc for FAQ, and moved all related pages in docs/user-manual/modules/FAQ/pages.
Replaced links to and from the FAQ module in the entire camel repository. I'm not sure how to run link checker locally.

I hope these changes make more sense now. I have made them in accordance with @djencks's comments on the JIRA issue

nodes.bodyText:
We have a typo here (and seems we always did have)

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            For more information see xref:faq:how-does-the-website-work.adoc[How does the website work] or xref:faq:how-do-i-edit-the-website.html[How do I edit the website for more details].
          
          
            
            For more information see xref:faq:how-does-the-website-work.adoc[How does the website work] or xref:faq:how-do-i-edit-the-website.adoc[How do I edit the website for more details].

 * If you want to add more documentation check for .adoc in codebase
 
-For more information see https://camel.apache.org/manual/latest/faq/how-does-the-website-work.html[How does the website work] or https://camel.apache.org/manual/latest/faq/how-do-i-edit-the-website.html[How do I edit the website for more details].
+For more information see xref:faq:how-does-the-website-work.adoc[How does the website work] or xref:faq:how-do-i-edit-the-website.html[How do I edit the website for more details].
